pages.title: Gamedeus Muteki
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ex-Aid: Final Stage (2017, stage show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:ex_aid/devices/gamer_driver_gamedeus_muteki)Gamer Driver (Gamedeus Muteki)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance VII$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste V$(li)Saturation III$(li)Jump Boost IV$(li)Fire Resistance$(li)Strength V$(li)Save
